General.Name: Plotech Co Ltd
General.Description: Plotech Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells printed circuit boards (PCB's) in Taiwan and China. It offers PCB's of various layers for applications, such as automotive, telecommunication, Bluetooth, LCD displays, storage, connectors, scanners, industrial PC's, medical equipment, computers, wireless, power supply, dram modules, probe cards, load boards, burn-in board power supply, GPS, wireless, research and development prototypes, digital cameras and video, IA products, PDAs, cellular phones, etc. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.33, Ta Yeou Street, Taoyuan City, Taiwan
